title: Zoom Meetings
text:
Was a year into the role when the unexpected occurred.
What started as a 2 weeks of precautionary measure turned into a months-long shutdown.

title: Zoom Meetings
text:
Depression and Anxiety
Began hearing this term regularly during those period.
I myself experienced this, after hearing gloom and doom incessantly, I began to fear for the future. Specifcally if future had a place for me.

title: Life Among Young People
text:
Got a call from a source, one normally tries to avoid.
The Stake Presidency of the BYU Young Singles Adult Stake wanted to meet one Saturday afternoon.
However, upon meeting a Stake Presidency member, we listened to the role.
We deliberated and took it.
Next day, we attended the Ward and we were sustained and set apart.
Thus began a 5 year journey
That was August of 2017

title: Refreshments & Nourishment
text:
A sister from HK, upon seeing the food, remarked.

It is real food.

The food was simple, modern version of 비빔밥.
Think she was expecting some refreshment instead.
Growing up, gathering meant food.
More exquisite the food, more special the gathering
When does refreshment become a nourishment.
Can nourishment turn into a renewal of the body and spirit.
And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread.
But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.
Matthew 4:3,4
